alert.note: Alert for Andrew; Atchison; Holt; Nodaway (Missouri) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued June 30 at 6:54AM CDT by NWS Kansas City
info.description: ...Strong thunderstorms will impact portions of southeastern Atchison, Holt, southern Nodaway and northern Andrew Counties through 730 AM CDT... At 654 AM CDT, Doppler radar was tracking strong thunderstorms along a line extending from 8 miles west of Skidmore to near Mound City to near Forest City. Movement was east at 40 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts up to 50 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Locations impacted include... Maryville, Savannah, Mound City, Oregon, Ravenwood, Maitland, Skidmore, Forest City, Fillmore, White Cloud, Barnard, Conception Junction, Bolckow, Graham, Rosendale, Guilford, Clyde, Arkoe, Rea and Quitman. This includes Interstate 29 between mile markers 63 and 87. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...50 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. Frequent cloud to ground lightning is occurring with these storms. Lightning can strike 10 miles away from a thunderstorm. Seek a safe shelter inside a building or vehicle.
